translation.en: I got a call from Peta, telling me, "Vasi, are you crazy?"
translation.it: Peta mi ha chiamato dicendo: "Vasi, sei impazzito?

translation.en: "Asking him to go away from his family again for no reason?"
translation.it: Lo porti di nuovo via dalla famiglia senza motivo?

translation.en: "He's not going to do the Tour de France, Sam Bennett will."
translation.it: Non sarà lui ad andare al Tour, ma Sam Bennett".

translation.en: We were like, "We're gonna have loads of time off now,
like, this is going to be fine."
Yeah, we were going to go away
and get to kind of come together and spend time with each other.
And then I said, "Peta, let him go."
translation.it: Ma le ho detto: "Peta, lascialo andare".

translation.en: [Mark] I was out doing, like, a super-long ride.
translation.it: Ero andato a fare un allenamento lungo in bici

translation.en: And when I got in, I had a missed call from Head Sports Director.
translation.it: e, al rientro, avevo una chiamata persa del direttore sportivo.

translation.en: Hello?
Sam Bennett had had a knee injury.
translation.it: Bennett aveva un problema al ginocchio.

translation.en: There was a big discussion, how we go to the Tour de France.
translation.it: Abbiamo discusso a lungo su chi portare al Tour de France.

translation.en: It was, like, 50-50, very much doubting Mark Cavendish.
translation.it: Il team era spaccato a metà. C'erano molti dubbi su Mark Cavendish.

translation.en: Then I said, "I want Mark." "Yeah, but you're crazy."
I said, "No, I want Mark."
And, of course, at the end of the story, I'm the boss.
translation.it: Ed essendo il capo l'ho spuntata io.

translation.en: A bit speechless, like.
I was shocked.
[Patrick] I had a very good gut feeling.
Some things you can't explain.
You feel the ambition, you feel he wanted to race.
translation.it: Sentivo la sua ambizione, la voglia di gareggiare.

translation.en: Champions, they are ready to do a lot of effort
translation.it: I campioni sono pronti a impegnarsi

translation.en: to show the world, "I'm not done."
translation.it: per dimostrare di non essere finiti.

translation.en: [Mark] I built my whole career around this race.
translation.it: Ho costruito la carriera attorno a questa corsa.

translation.en: Nothing changes to just be buzzing to be here.
translation.it: Essere qui è l'emozione più grande che ci sia.

translation.en: It was such a pure joy that I had for him.
He got to go back to that race, back where he loved.
translation.it: Doveva tornare al Tour perché l'amava troppo.

translation.en: [Vasilis] At the start of the season, nobody ever thought
translation.it: A inizio stagione, nessuno si aspettava

translation.en: that Mark Cavendish was going to the Tour de France.
It was out of the question.
He was a guy who couldn't finish a race for the last three years.
translation.it: Non arrivava a finire una gara da tre anni.

translation.en: It's already, uh, more than a dream to be here.
translation.it: È già un sogno pazzesco essere qui.

translation.en: [chuckles] Last minute call-up.
I have some self-belief, but even that, I wouldn't have believed.
translation.it: Credo in me stesso, ma non aspiravo a tanto.

translation.en: [man] Cav, he's been on top of the game forever.
translation.it: Cav è tra i migliori ciclisti da sempre.

translation.en: I was teammates with him. That shows you how long it was.
translation.it: Ho corso con lui e questo vi fa capire da quanto.

translation.en: That shows you how old he is.
Cavendish is 36 now.
I don't think it's going to happen. It would be an amazing story.
translation.it: Non penso abbia speranze. Sarebbe una storia pazzesca.

translation.en: [Patrick] People like this.
The story of the…
the lost son
who has the chance to get back
translation.it: che ha modo di tornare a far parte

translation.en: on the biggest theater of the world in our sport.
translation.it: della più grande gara ciclistica al mondo.

translation.en: If I wasn't able to win the Tour de France stage,
translation.it: Se non fossi in grado di vincere una tappa al Tour,

translation.en: I don't think I'd be in the Tour.
That's right, boss, no?
Like, I mean…
Everything was good enough for me because I paid him peanuts.
translation.it: A me andava bene tutto, pagandolo pochissimo.

translation.en: So, who I am to ask somebody results if I pay him peanuts?
translation.it: Come potevo chiedergli dei risultati dandogli uno stipendio da fame?

translation.en: And I said, "I know this is really unfair what's happening."
translation.it: Gli ho detto: "So che è un trattamento ingiusto.

translation.en: "You are here in the Tour de France with this shit salary,
translation.it: Sei qui al Tour de France con una paga di merda,

translation.en: but I give you a bonus for every week you survive."
translation.it: ma ti darò un bonus per ogni settimana che sopravvivrai.

translation.en: "And I give you a bonus for every stage you win."
translation.it: E uno per ogni tappa vinta".

translation.en: [Mark] I was nervous.
It's a different level to the rest of cycling.
translation.it: Il livello è diverso dalle altre gare.

translation.en: It's really a different level.
I hadn't been there for a few years, so I didn't know what to expect.
translation.it: Non partecipavo da anni e non sapevo cosa aspettarmi.

translation.en: [Vasilis] I knew that he was strong enough to survive.
translation.it: Sapevo che era abbastanza forte da sopravvivere.

translation.en: I knew that he would suffer like a dog every day.
translation.it: Sapevo che avrebbe sofferto ogni giorno.

translation.en: But Mark's a big, big champ and a big warrior.
translation.it: Ma Mark è un grande campione e un grande guerriero.

translation.en: [Vasilis] He's just going to win for his kids.
translation.it: Avrebbe vinto per i suoi figli.

translation.en: You know, Casper had never saw him winning.
translation.it: Casper non l'aveva mai visto vincere.

translation.en: I had all of the kids at home.
translation.it: Lo seguivo da casa coi bimbi.

translation.en: With it on the TV.
[Delilah] You got this.
[Peta] The children are just over the moon and excited.
translation.it: I bambini erano al settimo cielo.

translation.en: [Peta] But regardless of anything that happened now,
translation.it: Ma, nonostante ciò che era successo,

translation.en: whether he left after a week,
translation.it: anche se avesse mollato dopo una settimana

translation.en: whether he won no stages, whether he whatever, it didn't matter
translation.it: senza vincere nessuna tappa, non avrebbe avuto importanza

translation.en: because he'd got to go back to that race.
translation.it: perché per lui contava partecipare al Tour.

translation.en: [commentator] The Tour de France is underway and the first attacks are beginning.
translation.it: Il Tour è iniziato e i primi ciclisti attaccano.

translation.en: The fight is on.
A fairytale return for Mark Cavendish.
translation.it: Un ritorno da favola per Mark Cavendish.

translation.en: [Delilah] Go on!
It started so fast.
[commentator] Here, everybody's going for everything.
It was the Tour de France,
but a level up from where I'd left a few years ago.
translation.it: ma il livello era salito rispetto a qualche anno prima.

translation.en: I… I remember thinking to myself, like,
"What the fuck have I done here?"
"Oh, shit."
[commentator] Oh, crash behind.
And I think that is a mass crash.
Really hectic right now
because there was a crash in the back of the peloton.
translation.it: perché c'è stata una caduta in fondo al gruppo.

translation.en: [commentator 1] Another rider down.
Huge crash behind! Oh, that's carnage!
translation.it: Una grossa caduta dietro! Che massacro!

translation.en: [commentator 2] It's an absolute shocker.
This is exactly what we didn't want to happen
translation.it: È proprio ciò che non volevamo vedere

translation.en: on the opening day of the Tour de France.
Wow! It is absolutely crazy here.
[commentator 2] Yet another one! Sagan is down!
[commentator] Awful crashes that have taken their toll on the race already.
translation.it: La gara ha già visto diverse brutte cadute.

translation.en: We've got several riders very patched up here.
I just count myself lucky I didn't come down like some of the other guys.
translation.it: Mi considero fortunato perché non sono caduto.

translation.en: This race.
We always talk about how dangerous the first week of the Tour is.
translation.it: Diciamo sempre quant'è pericolosa la prima settimana di Tour.

translation.en: These guys go to bed every night
praying they're not gonna hit the deck in the first week.
translation.it: pregando di non finire a terra la prima settimana.

translation.en: [man 1] They are going a lot faster.
[man 2] Faster speeds than we've ever seen.
translation.it: Non è mai stata a questi livelli.

translation.en: [commentator] It's not often you see that.
Not often you see that little display of vulnerability.
translation.it: Non si vede spesso una simile vulnerabilità.

translation.en: [Vasilis] He was racing against the fastest sprinters in the world.
translation.it: Gareggiava contro i migliori velocisti al mondo.

translation.en: Most of them are really young, and,
in the normal, he cannot beat them.
translation.it: e di norma imbattibili per lui.

translation.en: Last time I'd won at the Tour, I'd won in Fougères.
translation.it: L'ultima tappa vinta al Tour era Fougères.

translation.en: I spoke to my teammates about it,
translation.it: Ne ho parlato coi miei compagni

translation.en: and said, "The most important thing is to get into that final right-hander
translation.it: dicendo: "È cruciale imboccare bene l'ultima curva sulla destra

translation.en: near the front."
"Get me there and I'll do it."
[man] My pick is Cavendish.
Are you kidding me? You have these man-crushes.
And they take over your life.
Absolutely not.
[man] Well, we'll see.
[commentator 1] That's an awful lot of not just damaged equipment,
translation.it: Questo gruppo ha riportato molti danni

translation.en: but damaged bodies in this peloton.
translation.it: non solo alle bici, ma anche ai ciclisti.

translation.en: [commentator 2] I've never seen so many riders in bandages.
translation.it: Non ho mai visto così tanti ciclisti feriti.

translation.en: Another thing I've seen is Mark Cavendish, who's stopped.
translation.it: Ho anche notato che Mark Cavendish si è fermato.

translation.en: He did something on his handlebar or his cleats.
translation.it: Armeggiava col manubrio o con le tacchette.

translation.en: Bit of trouble there for Mark Cavendish.
[Casper] ♪ Come on, Daddy! ♪
[Peta] There had been a problem. He'd had a mechanical and dropped back.
translation.it: Dopo un intoppo meccanico, è stato aiutato ed è rimasto indietro.

translation.en: And it was like, "Oh, shit."
[commentator 1] So, we've got a breakaway.
[commentator 2] Don't be surprised about this rider disappearing
up the road and causing the peloton a huge problem.
translation.it: che si sta staccando creerà grossi problemi al gruppo.

translation.en: [Peta] A breakaway is when a rider breaks away from the main peloton
translation.it: La "fuga" è quando un ciclista si stacca dal gruppo principale

translation.en: and goes off on their own out at the front of the race.
translation.it: e parte da solo per portarsi in testa.

translation.en: [commentator] This is the time trial of his life.
translation.it: È la cronoscalata della sua vita.

translation.en: It's going to be tight. The stage win is still possible.
translation.it: Il distacco è minimo. La vittoria di tappa è possibile.

translation.en: [Peta] And you've got a group behind of 100-plus riders
translation.it: E dietro hai un gruppo di oltre 100 ciclisti

translation.en: that are chasing you down.
I was looking at the times and working it out
and thinking, "They're leaving it very late."
"That is going to need a big pull to be on the front."
translation.it: Servirà qualcuno che tiri per arrivare davanti".

translation.en: Mom, I don't know…
[Mark] Julian was in green, and I remember him just going on the front
translation.it: Julian aveva la maglia verde e ricordo che era davanti

translation.en: and just pulling.
Just pulling with no thought other than catching the break.
translation.it: Tirava pensando solo a chiudere sulla fuga.

translation.en: [commentator] Mark Cavendish in the burn seat, just for the time being.
translation.it: Cavendish è in una posizione difficile.

translation.en: Where is he? Yes.
[commentator] What a night this is for Brent van Moer. Can he hold on?
translation.it: Che serata per van Moer. Riuscirà a tenere duro?

translation.en: They're hunting him down. They're coming!
translation.it: Gli sono alle costole. Stanno arrivando!

translation.en: [Peta] Mark's in the middle of all of that. Daddy's blocked in.
translation.it: Mark è là in mezzo. Papà è bloccato.

translation.en: [commentator] Look at this. 350 meters to go!
Can he be caught? It's going to be tight!
translation.it: Lo raggiungeranno? Il distacco sarà minimo!

translation.en: Oh, no, he's boxed in, he's boxed in.
translation.it: Oh, no, è chiuso in volata.

translation.en: He's in the middle of it.
Come on!
-Go! -Come on!
[commentator] There goes Mark Cavendish!
And here comes Mark Cavendish!
[Casper] Let's do it!
[commentator] He can possibly get there.
[Peta] Oh, my God, oh, my God.
[commentator] Mark Cavendish is going to do it. He's done it!
translation.it: Mark Cavendish c'è quasi. Ce l'ha fatta!

translation.en: [Delilah] Daddy did it!
-Yes! -[Delilah] Daddy did it!
[commentator] That is unbelievable
in so many ways!
[Peta] He did it!
[Peta] Everything that we'd been through those last few years,
translation.it: Ciò che abbiamo passato negli ultimi anni,

translation.en: that holding on, that believing,
just all came out in one go.
[Mark] All I want to do is just see my boys, you know.
That's all I want to do.
Just nice to share this with them.
Fucking hell, Mark. You are so fucking fast.
[Vasilis] To me, that was the biggest comeback. It's a dream.
translation.it: Per me è stato un ritorno fantastico. Un sogno.

translation.en: Even now I'm getting emotional because…
it was just something unbelievable,
what happened right then.
translation.it: ciò che è accaduto quel giorno.

translation.en: And I was so proud.
You know, being part of it.
It takes a lot for me to sit there and go, "Did I…"
translation.it: Ci ho messo un po' a rendermi conto…

translation.en: "I don't think I witnessed what I witnessed."
I'm shocked.
And at the same time, I'm so proud of him
translation.it: E, al contempo, sono fiero di lui

translation.en: and happy for him.
[man] Just to see what he's been through.
A lot of self-doubt, a lot of depression.
Um… I don't like being wrong,
but for this time, I'm really glad I was wrong.
translation.it: ma stavolta sono felice di averlo fatto.

translation.en: [Patrick] I think it was like a fairytale, huh?
translation.it: È stata una sorta di favola.

translation.en: Somebody who was lost, given up by everybody.
translation.it: Qualcuno si perde e viene abbandonato da tutti.

translation.en: It's like a dream. [laughing]
What are you doing to me?
I was near to a heart attack.
And then, taking his chance.
translation.it: E poi ottiene la sua chance.

translation.en: [Mark] Thank you, man.
You thank me already with what you did.
And then winning.
Thank you for believing, for making me happy.
translation.it: Grazie per averci creduto e per avermi reso felice.

translation.en: The whole year, I'm just happy again.
People don't believe in miracles, me neither.
translation.it: La gente non crede nei miracoli e neanch'io,

translation.en: But we did it, and all the rest, fuck them.
translation.it: ma ce l'abbiamo fatta e fanculo agli altri.

translation.en: [Lance] Cav is back.
Today, he won his 31st stage,
translation.it: Oggi ha vinto la sua 31ª tappa.

translation.en: only three behind the greatest of all time, Eddy Merckx.
translation.it: Gliene restano solo tre per raggiungere Merckx.

translation.en: Really, really happy for him because, well, I told you.
translation.it: Sono felicissimo per lui. Vi ho già detto perché.

translation.en: [commentator] Cavendish perfectly placed.
Daddy's led out.
Do it!
You can do it.
I miss him.
Mark Cavendish shakes two fists at the sky.
translation.it: Mark Cavendish alza due pugni al cielo.

translation.en: [Lance] Dude…
speechless.
[reporter] Mark, it's your 32nd victory.
You know what my question is going to be.
translation.it: Sai già quale sarà la mia domanda.

translation.en: -Don't say the name. -I didn't say it.
translation.it: - Non dire quel nome. - Non l'ho fatto.

translation.en: I'm not thinking about anything.
He knew he could beat all of them.
Yeah, once he starts winning, he just can't stop.
translation.it: Quando inizia a vincere, non riesce a fermarsi.

translation.en: [commentator] Cavendish in a near-perfect position here for win number 33.
translation.it: Cavendish è in posizione quasi perfetta per vincere la 33ª tappa.

translation.en: When's he going to light it up?
The line belongs to him!
Thirty-three. Eddy, are you watching?
[reporter] I didn't ask you the question.
translation.it: Non ti ho fatto la domanda.

translation.en: [laughs] Thank you. Oh shit yeah.
Daddy, Daddy!
[commentator] Are we going to see Eddy Merckx's record matched by Mark Cavendish?
translation.it: Mark Cavendish eguaglierà il record di Eddy Merckx?

translation.en: Cavendish, the Manx Missile, is he going to match Merckx?
translation.it: Cavendish, il Missile dell'Isola di Man, eguaglierà Merckx?

translation.en: [laughing] He's done it!
Thirty-four stage wins!
We made history!
[Lance] Unbelievable.
Now he has tied the record.
I never thought this would happen.
But I'm psyched for him.
And I'm done.
I'm done bashing on Mark Cavendish. I promise.
translation.it: Non attaccherò più Mark Cavendish. Promesso.

translation.en: Yeah. Just…
I was in tears. The joy.
translation.it: Ero in lacrime. Per la gioia.

translation.en: Just the… Oh, the emotion and joy that he got out of that.
translation.it: Per l'emozione e la gioia che ha provato.

translation.en: That's huge. Huge, yeah.
Something that we'd spoken about in the darkest of his times.
translation.it: Ne avevamo parlato nei suoi periodi più bui.

translation.en: I know how far he has come.
Yeah.
[Peta] Having to be broken and rebuild yourself,
translation.it: Essere a pezzi e doversi rimettere in sesto

translation.en: I think it definitely made him
remember why he sacrifices what he sacrifices.
[reporter] Mark, can I ask you the question?
What's it like to be the equal of Eddy Merckx?
translation.it: Com'è eguagliare il record di Eddy Merckx?

translation.en: It really brought a human side
to what I do for the first point in my career, really.
translation.it: a ciò che faccio nella mia carriera.

translation.en: It made me realize
I didn't win it alone.
translation.it: che non ho vinto da solo.

translation.en: I wish I knew that.
I could go back and do my career again knowing that, you know.
translation.it: Vorrei poter affrontare da capo la mia carriera sapendolo.

translation.en: This is how it was always supposed to be.
[in unison] We're so proud of you, Daddy.
translation.it: Siamo molto fieri di te, papà.

translation.en: [Lance] How sick would it be,
he's at 34,
coming into Paris, and he's still in the race,
translation.it: arrivare a Parigi, ancora in gara,

translation.en: and that's the day to break the record?
[man] You can't script that.
-You cannot script that. -Yeah.
You all right?
-Hi. -Can I give Daddy these?
translation.it: - Ciao. - Posso dare questi a papà?

translation.en: -Look who it is! -[Mark] Hello!
[Casper] Hello, Dad!
Hi, Dad!
Daddy, you got me a present.
translation.it: Papà, mi hai preso un regalo.

translation.en: Hello.
[Peta] Daddy, have you got me my new green jersey?
translation.it: Papà, mi hai preso una nuova maglia verde?

translation.en: [Casper] Daddy, what's that noise?
[Peta] Daddy's going to do his race. We'll see him at the finish.
translation.it: Papà deve fare una gara. Lo vedremo al traguardo.

translation.en: -Love you! -Good luck, Daddy!
We're here now, just coming through on to the 1 km flag.
translation.it: Siamo qui a un chilometro dall'arrivo.

translation.en: This is the Champs-Élysées.
The most beautiful finish to any bike race in the world.
translation.it: Il traguardo ciclistico più bello del mondo.

translation.en: I was very fortunate to do that with that man,
translation.it: Io ho avuto la fortuna di condividerlo

translation.en: Mark Cavendish, who's going for number five today.
translation.it: con Cavendish, che oggi punta alla quinta vittoria.

translation.en: It's magic. Magic.
This is going to be my last transmission.
I love it. I love this sport.
I'll hand you back to the commentary team. And come on, Mark!
translation.it: Passo la parola ai commentatori e forza Mark!

translation.en: [commentator] Three weeks of racing in France, and it all comes down to this.
translation.it: Tre settimane di gare in Francia hanno portato qui.

translation.en: 700 meters to go!
Onto the cobbles on the Champs-Élysées.
Cavendish battling for space. It's getting tight!
translation.it: Cavendish cerca di farsi spazio, ma è dura!

translation.en: Cavendish, he's boxed in.
Van Aert takes it. Frustration for Cavendish.
translation.it: Van Aert avanza. Che frustrazione per Cavendish.

translation.en: Not to be in the end then, for Mark Cavendish,
translation.it: Non riesce ad avere la meglio, Cavendish,

translation.en: but, boy, can he be proud of the last three weeks in France.
translation.it: ma può andare fiero delle ultime tre settimane in Francia.

translation.en: Equaling the Merckx's record and taking the green jersey,
translation.it: Ha eguagliato il record di Merckx e avuto la maglia verde

translation.en: fully a decade after he last claimed it.
No one has ever done that before.
[Mark] There's no number that's enough.
[Mark] But I've got the most incredible family…
You all right, mate?
With that alone, my life is perfect.
translation.it: E già quella rende la mia vita perfetta.

translation.en: Daddy, did you win?
Daddy!
-Daddy! -[Peta] One minute.
What you doing?
-Daddy? -Casper, just give him a minute.
[Mark] I'll continue trying to win for as long as I believe I can win.
translation.it: Continuerò a cerca di vincere finché crederò di poterlo fare.

translation.en: [in German] Good morning from Austria with Bernie Eisel.
